comments.body: Skipped `1.11.0` on purpose (we just forgot to update versions after the `mlflow 1.11.0` release)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +2,6 @@Package: mlflow
Title: Interface to 'MLflow'
Version: 1.12.1
Authors@R: c(
  person("Matei", "Zaharia", email = "matei@databricks.com", role = c("aut", "cre")),

comments.body: Based on https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-release/R-exts.html#Platform-and-version-information (cmd+f for "The mandatory 'version'"), R package version numbers contain only numbers, so we don't add the .dev suffix here

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +2,6 @@Type: Package
Title: Interface to 'MLflow'
Version: 0.7.1
Authors@R: c(
  person("Matei", "Zaharia", email = "matei@databricks.com", role = c("aut", "cre")),

comments.body: super nit: this line is redundant :wink:
I vaguely remember some parsers in RStudio require the maintainer field to be defined explicitly since `Maintainer` is an old filed while `Author@R` is the new one, but I might be wrong.
